about.title: Who I Am
about.techTitle: By the way, here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

full.paragraph1: Greetings! I am a recent Computer Science graduate with a passion for crafting visually appealing and user-friendly websites. Prior to my foray into the tech industry, I earned a Bachelor's degree in Management. Despite this, my true passion has always lied within the realm of web development. As a motivated and diligent individual, I continually strive to refine my skills and keep up-to-date with the latest technologies.
full.paragraph2: In my spare time, you can find me keeping my problem-solving and strategic thinking skills sharp with a game of chess, venturing into new universes through my favorite science fiction books, or immersing myself in a captivating film. These activities are not just hobbies for me - chess enhances my strategic thinking, reading fosters my imagination and communication skills, and movies offer a rich source of storytelling and visual design inspiration.
full.paragraph3: As a new graduate, I am eagerly seeking a Junior Web Developer position in a company where I can apply my skills and passion for web development, and continue to grow professionally. If you have any available positions or know of any that may be a good fit, I would love to hear from you.

medium.paragraph1: Hello there! As a motivated recent graduate in Computer Science,  I specialize in designing eye-catching and user-friendly websites. I am on the lookout for a Junior Web Developer position where I can apply my knowledge, passion, and skills in a professional context.
medium.paragraph2: When I'm not immersing myself in code, you can find me stimulating my mind with a game of chess, exploring the imaginative universes found in science fiction literature, and drawing inspiration from the compelling storytelling and visual aesthetics in movies.
medium.paragraph3: Now as a proud graduate, I'm eager to join a forward-thinking company where I can contribute to innovative projects, learn from industry professionals, and grow as a web developer. If you know of any opportunities or have any positions available, I'm all ears and would love to hear from you.
